review: We got the Sling TV/ Amazon deal and absolutely love it! We cancelled our cable and are still able to watch all of the same shows, PLUS, have all of the Prime Videos on demand.  It's so easy to use, my 18-month old has even learned how to speak into the remote and pull up "Bubble Guppies".
